title: 1999/387/EC: Council Decision of 7 June 1999 appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 7 June 1999
appointing a member of the Committee of the Regions
(1999/387/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to Council Decision 98/110/EC of 26 January 1998(1), appointing members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions,
Whereas a seat as a member of the Committee has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Philip Houben, of which the Council was notified on 1 September 1998;
Having regard to the proposal from the Netherlands Government,
main_body: Mr A. G. J. M. Rombouts is hereby appointed a member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Philip Houben for the remainder of his term of office, which expires on 25 January 2002.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 7 June 1999.
For the Council
The President
E. BULMAHN
(1) OJ L 28, 4.2.1998, p. 19.
